lead_paragraph: Not much has been heard from Jay H. Walder, the former chairman of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority, since he resigned abruptly last year to take over the sleek and generously financed rail system of Hong Kong.

headline.main: Former M.T.A. Chief Recounts His Ups and the System's Downs
